module.name: Ceres Binding
module.description: The Ceres Binding API is used to bind GUI widgets to value models. Value models can be any kind of data source.
module.changelog:
Changes in 0.10

[CERES-45] Terminology change in the Ceres Binding API
[CERES-40] Inconsitent handling of focus-lost events on text components

Changes in 0.7

[CERES-23] Default value for primitive types is not set

Changes in 0.6.1

[CERES-19] JRadioButtons inside a ButtonGroup don't update their ValueContainer.
